title: DOP-C02 Policies & Standards Automation: Enterprise Governance at Scale
description: Master enterprise governance automation, policy enforcement, and compliance validation at scale. This expert-level lab covers AWS Config, Organizations, IAM policies to Azure Policy, Management Groups, and governance automation with intelligent compliance monitoring, automated remediation, and enterprise-grade security controls.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive governance automation with AWS Config → Azure Policy
Design enterprise policy frameworks with automated enforcement
Build intelligent compliance monitoring and violation remediation
Create automated security controls and governance workflows
Implement enterprise tagging strategies and resource organization
Design cost governance and resource optimization automation
Build compliance reporting and audit trail automation
Configure enterprise-grade access controls and policy inheritance
prerequisites: Expert knowledge of AWS Config, Organizations, and IAM policy frameworks
Advanced Azure Policy, Management Groups, and RBAC experience
Understanding of enterprise governance frameworks (ISO 27001, SOC 2, PCI DSS)
Experience with compliance automation and policy as code patterns
Knowledge of enterprise security controls and audit requirements
Familiarity with infrastructure as code and governance automation
businessScenario: Global Financial Corp operates across 25 countries with strict regulatory requirements (SOX, PCI DSS, GDPR, Basel III). They need to migrate their comprehensive AWS governance and compliance automation to Azure while maintaining enterprise-grade policy enforcement, automated compliance monitoring, intelligent remediation workflows, and audit-ready governance controls. The system must manage 500+ subscriptions, 10K+ resources with automated policy enforcement, real-time compliance monitoring, and zero-tolerance security violations.
